altername_name: Garou Densetsu - Shukumei no Tatakai ~ Fatal Fury - King of Fighters
name: Fatal Fury: The Battle of Fury
overview: Fatal Fury is a 2D fighter and is the first game in a series of one-on-one fighting games by SNK. It's a conversion of the original Fatal Fury arcade game. This first game does not yet feature the series' trademark pseudo 3D mode (which allows you to move between the foreground & background while fighting). Includes a two-player vs. mode.
